title: Pick/Ban "Freeze" Problem
body:
This has happened numerous times now - the launcher will freeze during picks/bans on somebody, then suddenly *zoom* up to present time in picks/bans. Sometimes, I have a hot second or to for my pick/ban, other times it shoves me out and says I dodged queue.

I am currently on a 30 minute wait from this happening and at -10 LP. This is becoming increasingly infuriating to deal with.

I'm playing on a Lenovo that I obtained around 2012/3 that's still doing pretty well for itself and its on a Windows platform. 


So i don't know what the issue is, but I didn't used to have it. Even if you can't fix it/aren't looking into it, at least illuminating the nature of the problem to me would be much appreciated - I'm getting sick of getting negative LP and long wait times for something I have no part in.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a poor connection or hiccup and causing you to lose sync with everyone in champion select.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good shape.  Also, if you have any apps running like play.tv or overlays then remove them as they've been known to cause freezing issues.  Hope that helps!
